stories.text:
If you wanted to protect a robot from gamma radiation or EMPs how would you do it?

There are two separate considerations: the robot's insides (CPU, memory) and the sensors (camera, microphone).

For the insides you could have a solid Pb enclosure with holes for wires. It would have to be snug though. Has anyone done anything similar?

For the sensors it's less clear because they by definition have to be exposed to the elements. There are robots studying Mars and the Sun (from a distance but still). Is there public information on how they are protected?
stories.title: How to protect a robot from gamma radiation or EMPs?
The Psychology of Online Political Hostility

stories.text: Hi all, I am looking for an opensource notion.so like editor also maybe the word for such an editor. Right now I know of the name block editor and the project http://editorjs.io. But I am looking for something react based, which doesn't use contentEditable. All help is appreciated.
stories.title: Ask HN: Open-source notion.so like block editor?
